data.name: Captain Soda
data.detailed_description:
Aliens are invading Earth, and their only weakness is... soft drinks?! You are our only hope! Go, Captain Soda!



A fast-paced action platform shooter featuring a unique level-looping mechanic not just for enemies but for yourself and even your bullets to create a tantalizing arcade gameplay experience. Customize your loadout by choosing a short-range weapon, a long-range weapon, and accessories to suit your mood. Tactical planning is key to efficiently refill your limited soda ammo, dodge enemy hazards, and take out waves of aliens.


A unique soda experience.

For the first time, play with cool soda weapons as you melt aliens in the sodapocalypse.

Inspired by Super Crate Box.

Captain Soda offers a new, rich experience for new and old arcade-game fans, featuring beautiful artwork, many levels & enemies, unique weapons and interesting mechanics per area

Play how you like.

Choose from a wide array of weaponry and character-enhancing accessories to customize your loadout

A fun level-based campaign mode.

Discover challenges and surprises for you to enjoy at your own pace in a campaign spanning 30+ levels and 3+ unique areas.

data.short_description: Captain Soda is a fast-paced screen-wrapping platform arcade shooter with a charming style. Customize your character, then run, jump, and shoot soda to defeat an alien apocalypse. Chemical warfare just got refreshing. Wishlist now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i5-7200U
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May run on a baked potato
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It's better if the baked potato has some green onions and sour cream
